recpies_authenticity.recipe_name: grilled chicken salad with strawberry vinaigrette
recpies_authenticity.ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, 6 cups mixed salad greens, 1 cup sliced strawberries, 1/4 cup slivered almonds, toasted, 1/4 red onion, thinly sliced, 1/4 cup crumbled feta cheese, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar, 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard, 1/2 teaspoon honey, Salt and pepper, to taste

matched_recipes.ingredients: 3  cooked, boneless chicken breast halves, diced, ⅓ cup  dried cherries, ⅓ cup diced celery, ⅓ cup toasted, chopped pecans, ⅓ cup low-fat mayonnaise, 1 tablespoon buttermilk, ½ teaspoon salt, ½ teaspoon ground black pepper, ⅓ cup cubed apples (Optional)

2 tablespoons brown sugar, ¼ cup water, ⅓ cup lime juice, ½ cup chili garlic sauce, 4 cups shredded, cooked chicken, 2 medium mangos - peeled, seeded and diced, 2  avocados - peeled, pitted and diced, 1 (10 ounce) package spring lettuce mix

matched_recipes.recipe_name: spinach salad with chicken, avocado, and goat cheese
matched_recipes.ingredients: ¼ cup pine nuts, 8 cups chopped spinach, 1 cup halved cherry tomatoes, 1 ½ cups chopped cooked chicken , 1 large avocado - peeled, pitted, and sliced, ½ cup corn kernels, ⅓ cup crumbled goat cheese

recpies_authenticity.ingredients: 2 boneless, skinless chicken breasts, 6 cups mixed salad greens, 1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved, 1/2 cucumber, thinly sliced, 1 orange, peeled and segmented, 1/4 red onion, thinly sliced, 1/4 cup sliced almonds, toasted, For the vinaigrette: 1/4 cup fresh orange juice, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 tablespoon white wine vinegar, 1 teaspoon honey, 1/2 teaspoon Dijon mustard, Salt and pepper, to taste
